Name: active_projects_only
Description: Include only projects with status = active.

Name: min_worker_availability
Description: Workers must meet a minimum availability threshold.

Name: user_story_ready
Description: User stories must be in status = ready.

Name: feature_priority_threshold
Description: Features must meet a minimum priority.

Name: sprint_in_progress_or_planned
Description: Sprints considered are in progress or planned.

Name: exclude_unresolved_blockers
Description: Exclude tasks blocked by blockers with status != resolved.

Name: backlog_status_refined
Description: Product backlog status must be refined.

Name: release_plan_planned
Description: Release plans must be in status = planned.

Name: roadmap_end_date_defined
Description: Roadmaps must have an end date set.
